traceability.evidence: A dedicated test suite (test/cli.check-mode.test.js) covers all acceptance criteria for --check mode: it verifies exit code 0 when no updates are available (JSON output), exit code 1 when safe updates exist in table (default), JSON, and XML modes, and exit code 2 on invalid flags (e.g. --format=bad) or out‐of‐range values (e.g. --min-age=10000). The CLI entrypoint (bin/dry-aged-deps.js) parses --check into a returnSummary flag, invokes printOutdated with returnSummary, and applies the correct exit codes (1 on updates, 0 when none, 2 on error). README.md also documents the --check flag and provides CI/CD usage examples.
